{"Abbreviation":"PF","Details":"Percentage of flowers that reached fruit set in a plant"}
{"Abbreviation":"AFW","Details":"Average weight of all fruits from a plant"}
{"Abbreviation":"PMF","Details":"Percentage of fruits of 100\u2009g or more, without physiological disorders, in a plant"}
{"Abbreviation":"AMFW","Details":"Average weight of marketable fruits in a plant"}
{"Abbreviation":"SSC","Details":"Degree of Brix measured by saccharimeter (average of 4 marketable fruits per plant)"}
{"Abbreviation":"PCol","Details":"Colourless (pink tomato) and yellow (red tomato) pericarp counted as 0 and 1, respectively"}
{"Abbreviation":"SS","Details":"Size of style scar on ripened fruit was scored based on the length of major axis. 0: <4\u2009mm, 1: 4\u2009~\u200910\u2009mm, 2: >10\u2009mm"}
{"Abbreviation":"PBF","Details":"Percentage of blossom-end rot fruits in a plant"}
{"Abbreviation":"PIF","Details":"Percentage of irregular-shaped fruits in a plant"}
{"Abbreviation":"PCF","Details":"Percentage of cracked fruits in a plant"}
{"Abbreviation":"PSF","Details":"Percentage of fruits less than 100\u2009g in a plant"}
{"Abbreviation":"LL","Details":"Length of a leaf under the first truss"}
{"Abbreviation":"LW","Details":"Width of a leaf under the first truss"}
{"Abbreviation":"SW","Details":"Width of a stem at the position of the first truss"}
{"Abbreviation":"H1T","Details":"Height of the first truss from ground"}
{"Abbreviation":"NFlo","Details":"Number of flowers after defloration (maximum number of flowers is 6\u2009per truss)"}
{"Abbreviation":"DTF","Details":"Number of days from seeding to first flower"}
